Episodes.Title: For Those Who Think Young
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: On Valentine's Day, the staff of the Sterling Cooper Advertising Agency is hustling and checking out the newest office equipment. Don and Duck clash over an account, and Betty hears from an old friend.

Episodes.Title: Flight 1
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Weiner, Lisa Albert, Robin Veith
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: A plane crash causes the firm to go after the account for the airline involved and drop the smaller airline they have an account with. Peggy pays a visit to her mother and sister, who are now guardians of a child.

Episodes.Title: The Benefactor
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Weiner, Rick Cleveland, Robin Veith
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Trouble rises on the set of a commercial while Don plays hooky from the office.

Episodes.Title: Three Sundays
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Weiner, André Jacquemetton, Maria Jacquemetton
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Freddy and Ken take a client out to lunch who stirs Roger Sterling's heart.

Episodes.Title: The New Girl
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Joan finds Don the perfect secretary, and Don finds himself in the middle of issues between TV comedian Jimmy and his wife, Bobbie.

Episodes.Title: Maidenform
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Don and Duck try to bury the hatchet, and Peggy attempts to join in on the execs' after-hours meetings. Also, Duck receives a family visit at the office.

Episodes.Title: The Gold Violin
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Weiner, Jane Anderson, André Jacquemetton
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: To show that he has "arrived," Don buys a new car. Pete, Harry and Ken come up with a plan to attract new business, and Don's secretary makes a serious error, which could mean trouble for Joan. Cooper gets a new piece of office ar...

Episodes.Title: A Night to Remember
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Betty becomes suspicious that Don is having an affair after her conversation with Jimmy Barrett, Joan helps out in the television department, and Peggy helps the church with a dance flyer.

Episodes.Title: Six Month Leave
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Weiner, André Jacquemetton, Maria Jacquemetton
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Don checks in to a hotel after his separation from Betty. Back at the office, he is forced to get rid of Freddy against his will because of his drinking problem.

Episodes.Title: The Inheritance
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Weiner, Lisa Albert, Marti Noxon
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Don and Betty try to keep up appearances as they go to Betty's parents after her dad has a stroke. Peter has a long-dreaded meeting with his mother before he and Kinsey leave for a convention in Los Angeles.

Episodes.Title: The Jet Set
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Don blows off the convention in Los Angeles when he meets a beautiful, exotic woman. Back at Sterling Cooper, a member of the creative staff comes out of the closet, and Duck falls off the wagon and initiates his power play.

Episodes.Title: The Mountain King
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Don drops off the Sterling Cooper radar and visits the wife of the man whose identity he stole. Back at the office, Bert and Roger consider the merger offer, Peggy makes a play for a real office, and Peter loses his father-in-law'...

Episodes.Title: Meditations in an Emergency
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Weiner, Kater Gordon, Robin Veith
Episodes.Actors: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser
Episodes.Plot: Under the backdrop of the Cuban Missile Crisis, Don returns to New York just as Betty finds out that she is pregnant. Meanwhile, everybody at Sterling Cooper contemplates their futures as news of the merger slowly leaks out.
